name: Rafa Legends Remake
description:
Rafa Legends Remake

A remake from one of my first games made it in 2013. A boy called Rafa was bored in his house and wants to go to an adventure, however the darkness comes back and want to conquer the world. Rafa found in his road a legendary sword that was used to defeat the dark lord before. Now its time to defeat it again.

Explore worlds, fight enemies, use diverse items, find secrets and be a part of the legend, but most importantly master the ninja attack, a great move that damages everything in your road and its crucial to continue your adventure

Changelog Ver 0.1.1

* When Rafa attack while running he slides further, you can stop inmediatly if you hold back

* Rafa can't use items while speaking or cinematics

* When Rafa crush some enemy that can be smashed, 10 frames of invincibility were given

* Rafa jumps slighty higher when crush an enemy

* Double hitbox glitch is fixed

* Pouks (Red Ball Enemies) in the start of the "outside" part of the fortress have moved further from the entrance

* Scooper (Brown Enemy with gun), Nubloca (Clouds enemies), Krull (Axe enemy) and Nubloca Boss Melee range attack deals less damage

* Nublocas melee hitbox is reduced

* Nublocas are more separated in the final section of the plains

* Nubloca Boss recieve more hitstun if you hit them

* Nubloca Boss melee hitbox range is reduced

* Nubloca Boss electric rock projectile can't generate electricty if hit on the "celling" of the arena
